metadata.title: Irfan Siddiqui condoles with former PMâ€™s press secretary Rai Riaz

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Jul 16 (APP): Leader of the Parliamentary Party of Pakistan Muslim League-Nawaz (PML-N) in the Senate and Chairman of the Senate Standing Committee on Foreign Affairs, Senator Irfan Siddiqui on Wednesday visited the residence of former Press Secretary to the Prime Minister, Rai Riaz Hussain, to offer condolences on the demise of his wife. During the visit, Senator Siddiqui met with Riaz Hussain and his son Rai Saqib Hussain. He expressed deep sorrow over the loss and offered prayers for the departed soul. Rai Riaz Hussain thanked Senator Irfan Siddiqui for visiting and offering condolences during this difficult time.
